channel.title: The Signal
channel.description: The Signal is an award-winning podcast dedicated to the SciFi show Firefly and its movie Serenity.
channel.itunes:author: The Signal Crew
channel.itunes:summary: The Signal is an award-winning podcast dedicated to the SciFi show Firefly and its movie Serenity.

item.title: The Signal: Season 10, Episode 6: Signal: The Movie
item.description: Features include: Road Trip: Portland, Oregon (1); Interview: Julian Higgins; Road Trip: Portland, Oregon (2); Music Section: Firefly Theme; Road Trip: Portland, Oregon (3); Diary of a Companion: Part 28; Road Trip: Arcata, California; How to Speak Chinese: Better Days and the Other Half; Road Trip: Kansas City, Missouri; They've All Got Stories: Genius Mechanic; Road Trip: Lansing, Michigan (1); Moonbrained Mike: New Job; Road Trip: Lansing, Michigan (2); Big Damn Test Kitchen: Banh Mi, Baked Apples and Garlic Shrimp Scampi; Road Trip: Elsmere, Kentucky; The Terraformers: Episode 29: This Mortal Coil; Road Trip: Atlanta, Georgia; Road Trip: Boston, Massachusetts; Around the 'Verse in 80 Days: Highgate; Road Trip: Cambridge, Massachusetts; Firefly in Five Lines: Claire's Choice; Road Trip: Banbury, England; Badger's World: Episode 34: Out To The Black; Road Trip: Milton Keynes, England; Broadwaves: Wolfblood; Road Trip: Farnham, England; The Raggedy Edge; Road Trip: Colchester, England; The Shipworks: Gang Aft Agley; Road Trip: Delft, the Netherlands; Much Ado about Much Ado about Nothing; Road Trip: Uelzen,Germany; Earthburn: Fire in the Darkness; Road Trip: Hamburg, Germany; Blue Sun Public Service Announcement: Browncoats; Road Trip: Mbeya, Tanzania; What's in a Signal?: Making the Signal Go Further; Shindig; Music Section: Mal's Song
